channel.title: Optimization on Supradax's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Optimization on Supradax's Blog

item.title: [Algorithm]Tarjan Algorithm
item.description:
Tarjan Algorithm, 主要用于求解强连通分量相关问题。

Strongly Connected Components，强连通分量(SCC)，指在有向图某一分量中的任意两个节点u,v存在u→v和v→u的有向路径；Weakly Connected Components，弱连通分量(WCC)，则只有一方可达（换为无向边时连通）。在无向图中只称为连通分量，不区分强弱。

Tarjan算法中，我们定义：

  • Tree Edge 树边，即DFS搜索树上的边 (Black)
  • Front Edge 前向边，与DFS方向一致，指向其某些子节点的边 (Blue)
  • Back Edge 后向边，与DFS方向相反，指回某些父节点的边 (Red)
  • Cross Edge 横叉边，从DFS搜索子树指向另一子树的边 (Green)

item.title: [Algorithm]The MST and the Shortest Path
item.description: MST, the minumum spanning tree, which is extracted from a connected graph with the least scale and overall weight. The MST has wide applications in the real world, for example, to minimize the total cost in a complicated work if we want to connect each server together.
